recipe.title: Quick and Easy Butter Chicken
recipe.ingredient: 6-8 chicken thighs cut into strips and strips cut in half
Serve with rice and/or naan bread and spicy chutney if desired
recipe.step: Place chicken in a bowl with paste, mix well and set aside for 10-20 mins.
Meanwhile heat oil in fry pan and cook garlic and onion.
Once done cook chicken in batches quickly.
Once all chicken done add back to pan, add soup and garam masala and cook for 15 minutes.
Then stir through cream and heat through.
